class.name: reactor
class.doc: This reactor internally uses epoll with edge-triggered mode.

method.name: add_readable
method.brief: Add a resource to the readable resource list.
method.doc: Only cybozu::resource::on_readable may call this when it stops reading from a resource before it encounters `EAGAIN` or `EWOULDBLOCK`.

method.name: add_resource
method.brief: Add a resource to the reactor.
method.doc: Add a resource to the reactor. The ownership of the resource will be moved to the reactor. Only the reactor thread can use this.

method.name: fix_garbage
method.brief: Fix the garbage resources to be destructed at the next cybozu::reactor::gc.
method.doc: Fix the garbage resources to be destructed at the next cybozu::reactor::gc. Only the reactor thread can use this.

return.doc: `false` if there are no garbage resources, `true` otherwise.

method.name: gc
method.brief: Destruct garbage resources fixed by cybozu::reactor::fix_garbage.
method.doc: Destruct garbage resources fixed by cybozu::reactor::fix_garbage. Only the reactor thread can use this.

method.name: invalidate
method.doc: Invalidate all registered resources to unblock other threads.

method.name: modify_events
method.brief: Modify epoll events for a resource.

method.name: quit
method.doc: Call this to quit the run loop gracefully. Only the reactor thread can use this.

method.name: remove_resource
method.doc: This is only for the reactor thread.

method.name: request_removal
method.brief: Add a removal request for a resource.
method.doc: Resources can be shared with threads other than the reactor thread. When such a thread successfully invalidates a resource, the thread need to request the reactor thread to remove the resource by calling this.

argument.name: interval
argument.doc: Interval between two callbacks in seconds.

method.name: size
method.brief: Return the number of registered and still valid resources.
